Modding Changes: - Girl body images will now try to match a chosen index if possible. Allowing images sets i.e 'face1' will try to match with 'portrait1', 'boobs1' and so on.
- Girl body images can be tagged using 'cum', 'creampie' and 'bp' to help match scenarios. 'creampie' being used by face, ass and pussy. 'bp' used only for ass and means she is wearing a buttplug.

- Changed the way girl id's as video tags is weighted. Should make videos with matching girl ids more common.
- Added 'park' event type, triggered when travelling through it, such as to and from academy.
- Added 'waited_around' variable which is True if the player waited via the HUD. Can be used to limit when your events can/can't trigger.
- Events can check if it was started via dialogue using 'event_started_from_dialogue'.
- Added 'dialogue_text' argument to Event class. This is used as the dialogue option text if event can be started via dialogue.
- Added stand alone 'show_video' and 'hide_video' functions.
- Added 'add_clothing_tags' function which allows more easily adding tags to clothing items.
- Added 'possible_clothing_request_sub_tags' and 'favored_clothing_item_sub_tags' to Sponsors. Allowing sponsors to request items with that tag or favored clothing to get a match bonus.
- Added support for temporary traits by giving them a 'duration_in_days' argument.
- Added 'add_temporary_trait' method to TraitManager.
- Raised 'too many photos' from 35 to 45.
- Raised 'too many videos' from 15 to 30.
- Girl ratings now check image aspect ratios rather than exact dimensions.
- Fixed temporary stat changes not working for area sensitivity i.e 'ass_sensitivity'.
- Added 'webm_tags_for_girls_to_ignore' for GirlRatings clarity.
- Renamed 'actions_already_done' for home visits to 'actions_already_done_home_visit' since the former is now used for other locations.
- Allowed modding in new fullbody image keys and requirements. See 'game/scripts/databases/fullbody_image_tags_ren.py' for more details.
- Added 'database_webm_inclusive_trait_tag_mapping' where you can tag certain traits to add multiple tags i.e 'big_boobs_fake' will also add 'big_boobs' as tag.
- Added support for static images to be shown like videos, these images should be tagged the same as the videos and be put into an 'action_videos' folder within the girl folder.
- Added 'force_orgasm' argument to most generic actions. It forces the target girl to cum if she didn't already.
- Added 'add_to_trait_influences_to_entries' utility function, allows applying 'trait influences' to multiple entries at once.
- Added 'insert_dict_entry_at_index' and 'add_or_merge_entry' utility functions. Can be used to help add new dialogue/descriptions or adjectives.

- Changed how home visit actions are tracked to function more closely to other locations. Mods might been to be update their requirements for this i.e 'my_action' not in actions_already_done -> 'my_action' not in actions_already_done[girl.id].
- Added clothing tag 'non_school' and 'non_work' to prevent girls from wearing it to school/work.
- Added support for modding in different event type 'girl lists'. i.e 'shoot' event types using the girls in the shoot.
- Added support for 'female_orgasm' which will play over 'orgasm' if person doing the action is another girl.
- 'caught cheating' event now pulls its options from several databases allowing users to mod in new options.
